divs: Sighting DetailsWhile reviewing my night vision camera I saw this object flying around my house....I have reported 2 other sighting of this object to MUFON and they said that it might have been a quadcopter not really sure that's what it is. In the beginning of the video 9-8-12 as the object is coming in to view it bolts to the right fast.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: While reviewing my night vision camera I saw this object flying around my house.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Shelby Township
There were no other sightings in Shelby Township on or around September 5th 2012
